tour.welcomeText: A quick tour to help you get oriented.
tour.step1Text: Choose from Sabadell, Tokyo, or Los Angeles to see real-time weather.
tour.step2Text: Toggle between English and Spanish with the language buttons in the header.
tour.step3Text: View hourly forecasts for today or up to 4 days ahead. Hours are shown in the city's local time.
tour.step4Text: Interact with the timeline to explore hourly forecast. The detail card shows the selected hour.
tour.stepTimelineText: Swipe or scroll the timeline. Tap an hour to update the detail on the right.
